previewArticle.title: Brazil vs. Germany: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Semifinal Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Brazil 1, Germany 7: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Semifinal Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Corner,  Brazil. Conceded by Bastian Schweinsteiger.

timelineItems.name: Gary Tobin
timelineItems.text: 8 World Cups between them, gonna be some game tonight!!! #BRAvGER

timelineItems.name: Stewart Craigon
timelineItems.text: Looking for a close game, 5-5 hopefully! #BRAvGER

timelineItems.comment: David Luiz (Brazil) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Miroslav Klose (Germany).
Corner,  Germany. Conceded by Marcelo.

timelineItems.desc: MLSSoccer.com's Simon Borg and Jesse Marsch break down the matchup between Germany and Brazil in their World Cup semi final match, and give the hosts a recipe for success without Neymar.
timelineItems.title: Life after Neymar: Brazil vs Germany Preview | Brazil Bound

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 13 - Thomas Müller is the 13th player to reach double figures for #WorldCup goals and the 5th German to do it. Bakers.

timelineItems.text: I'm in a German bar... And I've just lost my hearing. #BRAvGER

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - No side have kept more clean sheets in the 2014 World Cup than #GER (3), while #BRA have only kept one in their five matches. Tight.

timelineItems.name: Piers Morgan
timelineItems.text: David Luiz will drive Brazil to victory tonight. He's been my star of this World Cup. Such passion/commitment/determination. #BRAvGER

timelineItems.name: Lily-May Wray

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Via @MisterChiping: Germany became the first team to score four times in six minutes in a #WorldCup game. #GER

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 8 - #GER will play their eighth #WorldCup final - more than any other team. Mannschaft.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 10 - #GER fired in just 14 shots against #BRA - scoring seven from 10 on target (two off, two blocked). Müllered.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 16 - Thomas Muller has scored 10 goals and provided six assists in 12 #WorldCup matches. Update.

timelineItems.text: 18 - #BRAvsGER had the joint-most shots on target of any match in 90 minutes at the 2014 #WorldCup. Precision.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 167 goals so far at the 2014 World Cup, second-most ever at a single #WorldCup (171 in 1998).

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 10 - 10 of the Netherlands’ 12 goals in the 2014 #WorldCup have come after half-time. Patience.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 2.74 goals per game so far at the 2014 World Cup, most at a #WorldCup since 1982.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Dutch seek 2nd straight #WorldCup final. Argentina seeks its 1st WC final since 1990. Next on ESPN. #NED #ARG

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: This is the 34th #WorldCup semifinal match. None of the previous 33 finished 0-0.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: This is the 8th #WorldCup semifinal to reach extra time, first since Italy beat Germany 2-0 in 2006.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Argentina-Netherlands is the first #WorldCup semifinal to end scoreless.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 10 - #BRA allowed as many shots on target against them vs. #GER as they did in the previous five 2014 #WorldCup games put together. Sieve.

timelineItems.text: Toni Kroos scored twice in 69 seconds, for the fastest brace in #WorldCup history. #GER
